name: Intimate partner violence
summary: Four ICD-10 codes that indicate intimate partner violence. This will be an undercount of the true incidence of IPV.

name: Homelessness - Luchenski
summary: Codes to identify homelessness using an ICD-10 code, residence fields and GP practices that exclusively treat people experiencing homelessness.
adaptations_from_original: Three codes based on resladst, rescty and resgor added to the original list

name: Births - Zylbersztejn
ref: Zylbersztejn et al, PLoS ONE 2020; 15(12): e0243843.
datafields: diag, hrg, epitype, classpat, admimeth, neocare
dev_val: Comparison of birth rates to ONS estimates.
original_purpose: To develop a national birth cohort using HES.
flags: startage_7001_7002 = only valid if startage is 7001 or 7002 (i.e., less than 1 day or 1 to 6 days) (applies to all codes).

name: Multiple and still births - Zylbersztejn
ref: Zylbersztejn et al, PLoS ONE 2020; 15(12): e0243843.
target_phenotype: Multiple and still births and terminations
summary: Codes to identify still births, terminations and multiple births.
original_purpose: To develop a national birth cohort using HES
groups: Still births, terminations and multiple births
